s2.title: Disclaimer
s2.p: The &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion; contains a partial implementation of the W3C Document Object Model Level 3. This implementation is experimental. The DOM Level 3 specification is still in working draft stage: you should not consider this implementation complete or correct.
The limitations of this implementation are detailed below. Please, read this document before using &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;.

s2.title: Introduction
s2.p: The &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion; contains an experimental implementation of a subset of the W3C DOM Level 3 as specified in

ul.li: DOM Level 3.0 Core Specification, a W3C Working Draft of 09 April 2002 and
DOM Level 3.0 Abstract Schemas and Load and Save Specification, a W3C Working Draft of 09 April 2002.
DOMDocument: set/getActualEncoding, set/getEncoding, set/getVersion, set/getStandalone, set/getDocumentURI.

s2.title: Implementation of DOM Level 3 Load and Save

ul.li: DOMBuilder: does not provide implementation of parseWithContext() and DOMBuilderFilter.

s2.title: Implementation of DOM Level 3 Abstract Schemas
s2.p: The entire section has not been implemented in &XercesCName; &XercesCVersion;.
